title: Submit your best ideas to a naming, logo, or slogan contest
content: Fill out your Naming Brief and begin receiving name ideas in minutes

title: Contest holders rate your ideas and submit feedback
content: Rate the submissions and provide feedback to creatives. Creatives submit even more names based on your feedback.

title: Earn cash awards if your idea is chosen
content: Our team helps you test your favorite names with your target audience. We also assist with Trademark screening.

title: Earn badges, points, and bragging rights when a contest holder likes your ideas
content: Pick a Winner. The winner gets paid for their submission.
